entry.title: Monday night: Chance of showers. Low minus 1. POP 30%

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Monday 24 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 1. POP 60%
